    at={(22.25cm,2cm)}, %4.75
    hide axis,
    scale only axis,

       indices of colormap={
       \pgfplotscolormaplastindexof{viridis},...,0 of viridis}

    point meta min=0,
    point meta max=50,

       width=7cm,
